name: SetPlayerChatBubble
notes: You can't see your own chatbubbles. The same applies to attached 3D text labels.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
tips:
You can use color embedding for multiple colors in the message.
 Using '-1' as the color will make the text white (for the simple reason that -1, when represented in hexadecimal notation, is 0xFFFFFFFF).
description: Creates a chat bubble above a player's name tag.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player which should have the chat bubble.

params_body.name: drawdistance
params_body.description: The distance from where players are able to see the chat bubble.

params_body.name: expiretime
params_body.description: The time in miliseconds the bubble should be displayed for.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
